Question: This person died in Rome at the age of 88 (three weeks before his 89th birthday).
Hints: After ****'s death, it was decided to obscure the genitals ("Pictura in Cappella Ap.ca coopriantur").
This person returned to Florence but received no commissions from the new city government under Savonarola.
Today a modern reconstruction of this person's house can be seen on the Janiculum hill.
